typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.cs.lti.zhengzhl.Token
typeDescription.description: A token is a language unit that mostly refers to a word, which should be produced by a tokenizer.

featureDescription.name: pos
featureDescription.description: part of speech of this token.

featureDescription.name: lemma
featureDescription.description: the lemma form of the token.

featureDescription.name: stem
featureDescription.description: the stemmed for of the token.

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.cs.lti.zhengzhl.Sentence
typeDescription.description: A sentence refers to a natural sentence in the text.

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.cs.lti.zhengzhl.NGram
typeDescription.description: NGram is a language unit that span over N tokens, where N is a integer larger or equal than 0.

featureDescription.name: n
featureDescription.description: N that corresponding to this NGram, for example, 2 represents a bigram.

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.cs.lti.zhengzhl.Question
typeDescription.description: The question type refers the one single question.

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.cs.lti.zhengzhl.Answer
typeDescription.description: An answer is one possible answer for a question.

featureDescription.name: isCorrect
featureDescription.description: the boolean varaible indicating whether the answer is correct.
